org.xbmc.api.business

Interface IControlManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlManager

    public interface IControlManager
extends IManager
    This is the interface between the presentation layer and the business layer. All the controller of the presentation layer gets to see is this interface.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • seek

        void seek(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
        SeekType type,
        int progress,
        Context context)
        Seeks to a position. If type is
        • absolute - Sets the playing position of the currently playing media as a percentage of the media's length.
        • relative - Adds/Subtracts the current percentage on to the current position in the song
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        type - Seek type, relative or absolute
        progress - Progress
        context - Context reference

      • updateLibrary

                 Context context)
        Takes either "video" or "music" as a parameter to begin updating the corresponding database.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        context - Context reference
        mediaType -
